reviews.name: Mike T.
reviews.review: Finally something that works! I've tried creams and powders but the spray is so much easier to apply. Noticed relief within a few days.

reviews.name: Jason R.
reviews.review: Good product, easy to use. The spray bottle works well and doesn't make a mess. Would recommend shaking it well before each use.

reviews.name: David L.
reviews.review: Been dealing with athlete's foot for months. This spray helped relieve the itching and burning. Will definitely buy again.
